item.title: Kim add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Kim add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Kim add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Kim add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Make your own Bible. Select and collect all the words and sentences that in all your readings have been to you like the blast of a trumpet." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Kim add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "When it is dark enough, you can see the stars." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Kim add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kim add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Loyalty to country ALWAYS. Loyalty to government, when it deserves it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kim add a quote by Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.
item.description: "I find the great thing in this world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving - we must sail sometimes with the wind and sometimes against it - but we must sail, and not drift, nor lie at anchor." -- Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

item.title: Kim add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Kim add a quote by Bon Jovi
item.description: "You can't win 'til you're not afraid to lose" -- Bon Jovi

item.title: Kim add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "And remember, no matter where you go, there you are." -- Confucius

item.title: Kim add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "Wherever you go, go with all your heart." -- Confucius
